title: cisco
text: Collaborating closely with C-suite leadership, I transformed complex ideas into engaging visuals. Maintained brand uniformity across various projects, devised innovative design concepts, juggling multiple tasks. Additionally, I conducted deep research to guide design decisions and mentored team members as needed.

slides.bottomText: This showcase highlights our roadmap for the Security Design team's strategic development in FY24, meticulously designed to meet our business and organizational goals.

I was tasked with streamlining a lengthy document to fit slide formats, transforming the text into bullet points in accordance with Cisco guidelines. Simplified intricate concepts into engaging visuals.
While adhering to Cisco's guidelines, I also had the flexibility to design custom graphics that aligned with the visions of C-suite leadership without veering too far off course.
I also specialized in manipulating typography, color palettes, images, and various visual elements to craft designs that effectively communicated a specific message and evoked the desired emotion.

I was tasked with streamlining a lengthy document to fit slide formats, transforming the text into bullet points in accordance with Cisco guidelines. Simplified intricate concepts into engaging visuals.
I also designed custom wireframes that clearly depicted roadmap priorities.

slides.text: I really enjoyed collaborating with the c-suite leaders and diving deep into Cisco's plans for the upcoming year. Want to know more about this or other projects I've worked on? I'd be happy to chat.
